title: Dark Souls II version 1.02 2014 + dlc's repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)

Repack features:
- Ripped only languages except English ;
- Final game version: 1.02 ;
- Precracked - install and play;
- Install Time - 20 minutes [Quad core]

OS: Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 (32bit and 64bit)
Processor: AMD Phenom II X2 555 3.2Ghz or Intel Pentium Core 2 Duo E8500 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT, ATI Radeon HD 5870 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Network: Broadband Internet connection

Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller for 
Windows(or equivalent) recommended

  . Leather Shield sinner.

**INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,,play from desktop....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,,GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT.......
